title: Amazon Essentials Men's Fleece Crewneck Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall Sizes)
description: COMFORTABLE FIT: Designed with a regular fit, this men's crewneck sweatshirt provides an easy, comfortable fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
STAY WARM: Crafted from a soft, brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece, this men's sweatshirt keeps you cozy and warm
CLASSIC STYLE: This crewneck sweatshirt is casual and comfortable
DURABLE DETAILS: Featuring an athletic ribbed neck, sleeve, and bottom hem, this mens sweatshirt has enhanced stretch and recovery

These men's crewneck sweatshirts offer everyday comfort and style, crafted from a soft, brushed-back cotton-polyester fleece that feels cozy and warm. Featuring a regular fit with athletic ribbed trim at the neck, cuffs, and hem for added stretch and shape retention, they're available in standard, big, and tall sizes. This collection exemplifies consistent sizing and lasting quality for comfort that endures.
